price: 4. (Hij) Die hen in hongerige tijden voedt en hen veilig stelt tegen vrees.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
